`,(0,w.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"As a React developer, you\u2019re likely familiar with the benefits of using a statically-typed language like TypeScript. In a React context, TypeScript can also provide additional benefits such as improved code maintainability and extensibility. If you\u2019re new to TypeScript, it\u2019s a superset of JavaScript that adds optional static types to your code.
